passages.text:
On June 9, 1954, a man invites a group of guests to his secluded New England mansion, for a dinner party. However, during the party, Miss M. (one of the guests) is found dead in the library.
You are the detective tasked with solving the murder. You arrive at the scene and collect evidence. Your main suspect is Mr. S who was seen arguing with the victim during the party. The evidence is not suficient and you will need a confession.
You bring the crime suspect for questioning. Mr.S is a very wealthy man and if you upset him during questioning he will ask for his lawyer and you'll lose the case. Chose your next options carefully, present the right evidence and make him confess for his murder!
___________________________________________________________

Detective: I'd like to ask you a few questions...

[[Where were you last night?->Choice1]]
[[Last night you were at the party, correct?->Choice2]]

(set: $anger to 0) (set: $fear to 0)

links.name: Last night you were at the party, correct?

passages.name: START

passages.text:
Suspect: If you don't know, why am I here? (set: $anger += 1)

[[Continue]]
passages.name: Choice1

passages.text:
Detective: I would also like to ask...

[[How well did you know Miss M?->Choice3]]
[[I heard you had an argument with Miss M prior to her murder. You know that makes you our suspect?->Choice4]]
[[How was the food at the party?->Choice5]]

links.name: How well did you know Miss M?
I heard you had an argument with Miss M prior to her murder. You know that makes you our suspect?
How was the food at the party?

passages.name: Continue

passages.text:
Suspect: Oh, how well did I know her? Too well! That woman owed me money for months and always came with the excuse of how "life was difficult". Look at me, that dress she was wearing was certainly not cheap ... That liar! I ....... *sweating* I mean, I'm sorry for my language, detective.
(set: $anger -= 2)

[[Continue->Evidence]]
passages.name: Choice3

passages.text:
Suspect: And what if I did!? Are you accusing me of something, detective? I don't like that tone of yours...! (set: $anger += 2)

[[Continue->Evidence]]
passages.name: Choice4

passages.text: Suspect: Yes, it was delightful... but I don't understand how is that relevant? (set: $anger += 1)
passages.name: Choice5

passages.text:
Detective: Near the body we found this item. Can you tell me more about it?

Show an item:
[[Mr. S handkerchief]]
[[Miss M lipstick]]
[[Party Invitation]]
passages.name: Evidence

passages.text:
Suspect: I'm sorry. Is this interrogation a joke? This cleary belong to a woman! (set: $anger += 2)

(if: $anger <= -6) [[Continue->Ending 1]]
(if: $anger > 1) [[Continue->Ending 2]]
(if: $anger > -4 and < 2) [[Continue->Ending 3]]
